repairedDockerfile:
FROM oddpoet/zookeeper
MAINTAINER Yunsang Choi <oddpoet@gmail.com>

#=======================
# Install mesos
#=======================
RUN rpm -Uvh http://repos.mesosphere.io/el/6/noarch/RPMS/mesosphere-el-repo-6-2.noarch.rpm
RUN yum install -y mesos && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum clean all
